title: What's Keeping Me Up At Night?
description:
The abuse and neglect Harry's mom inflicted is causing nightmares even though he severed the relationship and thought he had moved on. - Dr. Laura: "The pain you bury can rear its head into your dreams."

What issues have popped up through your dreams? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
